description: Whether you are looking to wander or have a set peak to climb, the Nomad-W has you covered. Our workhorse binding based on the principles of our original SL, the Nomad-W has our X-Type Chassis, C4 Highback made from Carbon Nyolite and small boot Wayfinder strap. Light and bomb proof, the Nomad will take you anywhere.
name: Nomad-W + Split Interface (Women`s 7.5 - 10.5)
